content: use the traditional filet crochet technique to make a modern crochet blanket that s velvety soft thanks to bernat baby velvet this baby blanket design is fresh and cozy for any modern nursery the pattern boasts an easy-to-memorize 4-row repeat featuring double_crochet and chain stitches the windowpane motif is a nod to vintage style on this machine washable and dryable layer that s a winning gift for any new mom
